title.value: Эффективность фунгицида квадрис против болезней овощных культур открытого грунта
Quadris fungicide efficiency against openground vegetable crops diseases

journal.title: Agriculture and Plant Protection : scientific-practical journal

person.name: Prishchepa, I.A., National Academy of Sciences. Scientific and Practical Center for Arable Farming (Belarus). Institute of Plant Protection

abstract.value: In the conditions of the Republic of Belarus there were presented the results of researches on the efficiency of a fungicide quadris, SC application in table carrot (Daucus carota) and white cabbage (Brassica oleracea convar. capitata var. alba L.) crops. The biological efficiency of a fungicide against carrot leaves brown spot, alternaria blight and downy mildew of cabbage is determined. It is established that a single plant treatment restricts the disease harmfulness of the given crops and stabilizes a phytosanitary situation in agrocoenosises. Treatment of carrot crops with the fungicide reduced the development of brown leaf spot on 49,7-54,7 % with increasing yield by 33,6-39,4 centner / ha in comparison with the control and the output of marketable products 64,8-70,0%. Its use in cabbage crops reduced the mildew development by 38,8-52,6%, blight - by 48,3-50,4% and provided the yield increase from 8.2 to 29.8 centner / ha. To prevent the occurrence of resistance in plant pathogens it is recommended to alternate seasonal drug treatment with fungicide with other chemical groups with different mechanism of action.
